traits.personalityTraits:
I’ve enjoyed fine food, drink, and high society among my temple’s elite. Rough living grates on me.
I’ve spent so long in the temple that I have little practical experience dealing with people in the outside world.
traits.ideals: Change. We must help bring about the changes the gods are constantly working in the world. (Chaotic)
traits.bonds: I would die to recover an ancient relic of my faith that was lost long ago.
traits.flaws: My piety sometimes leads me to blindly trust those that profess faith in my god.

notes.personalPossessions:
a prayer book
5 sticks of incense
